user.description: Set up your TechnoVE station to integrate with Home Assistant.

data_description.host: Hostname or IP address of your TechnoVE station.

zeroconf_confirm.description: Do you want to add the TechnoVE Station named `{name}` to Home Assistant?
zeroconf_confirm.title: Discovered TechnoVE station

max_current_in_sharing_mode.message: Cannot set the max current when power sharing mode is enabled.

set_charging_enabled_on_auto_charge.message: Cannot enable or disable charging when auto-charge is enabled. Try disabling auto-charge first.

deprecated_entity_is_session_active.title: The TechnoVE {sensor_name} binary sensor is deprecated
deprecated_entity_is_session_active.description:
`{entity}` is deprecated.
Please update your automations and scripts to replace the binary sensor entity with the newly added switch entity.
When you are done migrating you can disable `{entity}`.
